response_parsed.title: Documenting Data Pipelines Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to effectively document data pipelines using the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+. It covers creating well-structured documentation for APIs, models, and endpoints.
key_points: Utilize the FastAPI documentation system to generate automatically updated API documentation
Leverage Markdown for clear and concise descriptions of API functionality
Document Models: Define schema for input and output data structures using Pydantic models
Document Endpoints: Describe each endpoint's purpose, input parameters, and expected output
Version Notes: Maintain a history of changes to the documentation with clear version notes

version_notes.changes: FastAPI 3.12 introduces new features and improvements to the documentation system, enhancing the ability to create well-structured API documentation.

caveats: Ensure all code examples are tested thoroughly and are representative of best practices
Keep documentation concise and easy to understand for users with varying levels of experience
